python_html_gallery package¶

Submodules¶

python_html_gallery.gallery module¶

python_html_gallery.gallery.GenerateHtmlImages(page, jpgs)¶

Creates HTML image elements

Args:

page: str, name of page for thumbnails. jpgs: list, jpg files to create thumbnails for.

Returns:

url_imgs: list, image links to write.

python_html_gallery.gallery.ListDirs(path)¶

Returns list of directories in path.

python_html_gallery.gallery.ListFiles(regex, path)¶

Returns list of matching files in path.

python_html_gallery.gallery.Now(time=True)¶

Returns formatted current time.

python_html_gallery.gallery.OrganizeRoot(output_dir)¶

Creates directories for images in root directory.

python_html_gallery.gallery.RandomThumb(page)¶

Returns path to random thumbnail for a given page.

python_html_gallery.gallery.WriteGalleryPage(page)¶

Writes a gallery page for jpgs in path.

Args:

page: str, name of page under root directory.

python_html_gallery.gallery.WriteGalleryPages(multithreaded=False)¶

Write gallery pages for directories in root path.

python_html_gallery.gallery.WriteIndex()¶
python_html_gallery.gallery.WriteNavigation()¶

Write navigation file with gallery links and thumbnails in root path.

python_html_gallery.gallery.get_description(casename)¶

Get the description from the case definintion :param casename: Name of the case as defined by the ‘name’ parameter of it’s entry in CASES_TO_PLOT in Case_definitions.py :return: The case’s description text

python_html_gallery.gallery.get_start_end_minutes(casename)¶

Get the start and end time minutes for a case as defined in Case_definitions.py :param casename: Name of the case as defined by the ‘name’ parameter of it’s entry in CASES_TO_PLOT in Case_definitions.py :return: tuple of the order (start_time,end_time)

python_html_gallery.gallery.main(output_dir, multithreaded=False)¶

Main function.

python_html_gallery.static module¶

Variables for gallery.py.
